DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , multicenter , phase 2 clinical trial evaluate antitumor activity brentuximab vedotin single agent patient CD30-positive nonlymphomatous malignancy .
DOC.brief_title: Brentuximab Vedotin Patients With CD30-positive Nonlymphomatous Malignancies
DOC.criteria: Histologicallyconfirmed central review CD30positive nonlymphomatous malignancy Have fail , refuse , deem ineligible standard therapy Measurable disease Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) Performance Status score 0 1 Karnofsky Lansky Performance Status score great equal 70 Primary diagnosis lymphoma central nervous system ( CNS ) malignancy History another primary invasive malignancy definitively treated remission least 3 year Evidence active cerebral/meningeal disease
